title: Valkyria Chronicles
notes: After 1st battle report, pressing space stops music but doesn't change display. It's frozen. Audio has occasional but regular distorted sounds. Long loading times to menus.

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: Good controler support, some sound glitches and some times get stuck on battle stats after completing a mission.

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: Lower fps. I'm getting higher fps on windows. sound effects are choppy but the bgm and voice acting is fine.

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: Does not allow game configuration. Sound in-game (not movies) stutters, sometimes does not play, etc. Does not exit cleanly.

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: Game lag sometimes, sound effect does not working

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: I was playing the first scenario, but it got stuck in the xp gain screen

title: Valkyria Chronicles™
notes: Doesn't fullscreen properly in 1920x1080 resolution. Sound effects go from choppy and abrupt to missing entirely. Upon exit, black screen followed by either game seizing up or taking 2-3 minutes to finally close... on a solid-state hard drive, no less.

Episodes are playable, but at the end of each battle, the game freezes at the battle report. Sound effects are choppy or don't play at all, but bgm and videos play without problems. Long loading times between chapters/menu.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: Disabled esync in Properties > Set Launch Options PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%. No problems like choppy sound effects, game lags, freezes after that - running perfectly.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: Disabled esync in Properties > Set Launch Options PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%. No game lags, freezes (after battle report screen). But sometimes has choppy sound effects.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: Needs to add 'PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%' to the launch option to get the audio to work properly. Everything works properly.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: Disabled esync in Properties > Set Launch Options PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%. Needed to tweak a few PulseAudio settings, check here: https://ludwig.im/en/projects/steam-pulseaudio-sound-latency-lagging-problem-noise#optimize-pulseaudio-settings-for-steam-games
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

gpu: ATI Technologies Inc. AMD Radeon (TM) R9 390 Series
notes: Game will begin to launch, but crashes to desktop after a brief black screen.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: No Problems with grafic and performance. There are just 2 little tweaks: 1st after a mission it took a while (about 3-5 minutes, definitly not more) with black screen till the menu is back. 2nd tweak is a a problem with soundeffects. Music and voices are perfect, but there are only e.g. no shooting sound, or effects while skipping in the menu, instead you have some undefinable sounds in background.  When focusing on game, I didn't realize the soundbugs.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes: Needs to add 'PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%' to the launch option to get the audio to work properly. Everything works properly.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes:
Had to disablee Esync with "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" to solve the sound problems.
Played it over 7 hours without problems so far. Switching controls from controller and back to M+K works flawless.
title: Valkyria Chronicles™

notes:
Everything seems to work after tweak: PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command% 
Some minor graphical clitches here and there but nothing that disturbs gaming experience. Totally worth trying(buying)!
title: Valkyria Chronicles™
